About

I love solving problems

Previously a long time manager in the retail industry, I became frustrated with the tools we had to work with. Poorly designed software and a lack of automation made mine and many others' lives more difficult. My passion for solving problems and all things tech led me to pursue a career in software engineering. Now, as a freelance developer, I am able to help both individuals and businesses not only solve problems but bring their ideas to the world. With a background in business, I understand what it takes to deliver exceptional value to any client. Whether it's a website, an application, or custom software; any problem you have, I can help.

Projects

Project 1: Lakeside Coffee Co.

Business website for a local cafe, mobile friendly and fully responsive.

Project 2: Plateia

Full-stack social media application with authentication and image uploads, built on the MERN stack with Redux.

Project 3: Irezumi

Tattoo artist's beautiful, grid-style portfolio of works with a web form for inquiries and requests.
